mapper.select: SELECT r.st_id, r.reg_st_name, r.department_line_name, r.department_name, r.reg_change_status, r.r_date, r.a_status, dl.department_line_name AS st_department_line_name, d.department_name AS ST_department_name FROM register r JOIN ST ON ST.ST_ID = R.ST_ID JOIN department d ON d.department_id = st.department_id JOIN faculty f ON f.faculty_id = d.faculty_id JOIN department_line dl ON dl.department_line_id = f.department_line_id
